name: SUKDMIG2D
description: Kirchhoff Depth Migration of 2D poststack/prestack data

parameter_descriptions.outfile: File for common offset migration output (default=stdout)
parameter_descriptions.fzt: First depth sample in traveltime table
parameter_descriptions.nzt: Number of depth samples in traveltime table
parameter_descriptions.fxt: First lateral sample in traveltime table
parameter_descriptions.nxt: Number of lateral samples in traveltime table
parameter_descriptions.dt: Time sampling interval of input data (from header if not specified)
parameter_descriptions.ft: First time sample of input data (from header if not specified)
parameter_descriptions.dxm: Sampling interval of midpoints (from header if not specified)
parameter_descriptions.fzo: Z-coordinate of first point in output trace (default=fzt)
parameter_descriptions.nzo: Number of points in output trace (default=5*(nzt-1)+1)
parameter_descriptions.offmax: Maximum absolute offset allowed in migration (default=99999)
parameter_descriptions.v0: Reference velocity value at surface (default=1500 m/s)
parameter_descriptions.mtr: Print verbal information at every mtr traces (default=100)
parameter_descriptions.ntr: Maximum number of input traces to be migrated (default=100000)
parameter_descriptions.npv: Flag of computing quantities for velocity analysis (default=0)
parameter_descriptions.tvfile: Input file of traveltime variation tables (required if npv>0)
parameter_descriptions.csfile: Input file of cosine tables (required if npv>0)
parameter_descriptions.dataout1: File containing additional migration output (required if npv>0)
